caption:
This photograph captures a moment of playful interaction at a public fountain. The focal point of the image is a young child, likely a boy, standing at the edge of a fountain. He is wearing a light-colored striped tank top and has short dark hair. The child is engrossed in the activity of splashing water with his hands, his face expressing joy and concentration.

Behind the boy, a woman, likely in her twenties, is partially visible. She has long dark hair and is smiling while watching the child play. The warmth in her expression suggests she might be a family member or caretaker.

In the background, there are blurred urban elements, including a red public bus or trolley, which adds to the downtown, lively setting of the scene. The bus provides a splash of color contrasting with the more muted tones of the surroundings, which include various shades of gray and green.

The atmosphere of the photograph conveys a sense of casual, summery enjoyment and the simple pleasure of a day out in an urban park or square, emphasizing a moment of connection and carefree leisure.
title: Splashing water from fountain on Nicollet Mall
